derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French from late Latin leprosus, from Latin lepra 'scaly' (see leper)

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or resembling or having leprosy

auth_sentence.content: Her literature...a leprous fiction which poisoned every virtue.
